## UserWallet.sign() method

Sign any message with the connected wallet private key

**Signature:**

```typescript
sign(message: string): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description         |
| --------- | ------ | ------------------- |
| message   | string | the message to sign |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string&gt;
